participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, but still working on overcoming shyness.
participant_1.background: I enjoy Halloween because I get to dress up as animals. I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends. My shyness made me panic and I didn’t show up. I went to an elite ivy league school. I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Independent and artistic, with a love for dance and creativity.
participant_2.background: I'm single and I need my space. I like to make my own Christmas cards. My favorite song is Barbie Girl. I'm known for my moves on the dance floor. I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite holiday?
Christmas! I love making my own cards. I'm single, so it's just me and my dog.
That sounds nice! I'm single too, but I love to dress up for Halloween. What's your favorite song?
Barbie Girl! I love to dance, and that's my go-to song for the dance floor.
That's awesome! I went to an Ivy League school, but I'm not very outgoing. I joined a ski club, and that helped me meet people.
Oh wow, that's impressive! I've never been skiing. I know how to snowboard, but I haven't been in a while.
I love snowboarding too! I'm not very good at it, but I have fun. I dyed my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
That's awesome! I've always been too afraid to dye my hair. I like to keep it natural.
I used to be shy too, but I've gotten better over the years. I'm still not great at it, but I'm trying.
That's good to hear! I'm glad you're trying to get out of your comfort zone
